attributes.action: change the rules on exemptions for online booking cool off periods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment if you book flights, train tickets, other transport online  they are exempt from a cool off period - so if you book a trip and within hours need to cancel if there is a no refund policy in place you cant challenge it. I think there should be a cool off period of at least 24 hours.
